main event: A round white object was spotted at Detroit Metropolitan Airport on 18 August 1958, indicating unusual behavior.
interesting points: The object blinked near the face of one per second and was brighter than a star., It traveled on a straight south path before passing behind a hangar., The object reappeared and appeared to double in size., The sighting lasted for a duration of 10 minutes., Various conclusions were drawn, including that it might be a balloon, aircraft, or possibly astronomical.
witness description: No witnesses were specifically described in the report.
